quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: - Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.
quotes.author: - C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand.
quotes.author: - Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
quotes.author: - Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
quotes.author: - George R.R. Martin

quotes.text: Books are the plane, and the train, and the road. They are the destination and the journey. They are hom.
quotes.author: - Anna Quindlen

quotes.text: Reading gives us someplace to go when we have to stay where we are.
quotes.author: - Mason Cooley

quotes.text: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library.
quotes.author: - Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.text: The only thing you absolutely have to know is the location of the library.
quotes.author: - Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
quotes.author: - Stephen King
